articles.title: Ayushmann Khurrana reveals pilot deliberately delayed Mumbai-Chandigarh flight to watch Ind-Pak match - read t - Times Now
articles.description: Ayushmann Khurrana watched India vs Pakistan match inside the flight. The actor revealed that the pilot of his Mumbai-Chandigarh flight delayed it to watch last two overs of the match. Read full story to know more details.
